name: Cyber Noir Stories: The Trunk (DEMO Version)
name_original: Cyber Noir Stories: The Trunk (DEMO Version)
description:
Visit Homepage Hi, I am Eve...

... a private investigator in New Cologne and ... ab-so-lute-ly broke.

So I can count myself lucky when suddenly this guy cames around the corner with that mission....

Simply bring a delivery reliably from point A to point B.

Easy job, good money.... But of course.... it turned out differently.

I am Eve Williams and this is my story.

Do you love interactive visual novels and exciting adventures?

Then dive into an unique genre hybrid that combines the best of both worlds!

The Trunk is an immersive, interactive adventure that revolves around a tough private investigator, a young woman with no memory and a job that turns out very differently than private investigator Eve imagined .
